```{r}
#| message: false
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(dagitty)
library(rethinking)

data("foxes")
setDT(foxes)
theme_set(theme_bw(14))
```

```{r}
foxes |> 
  melt("group") |> 
  ggplot(aes(value))+
  geom_histogram()+
  facet_grid(variable~.)
```

Standardizing variables.
```{r}
foxes_std <- foxes
foxes_std[, 2:5 := lapply(.SD, standardize), .SDcols= -"group"]
```


## 1. 
```{r}
sim_AF <- 
  function(A, bA){
    N <- length(A)
    Fd <- rnorm(N, bA*A, .5)
    data.table(A,Fd)
  }

sim_AF(A = runif(1e2,-2,2), bA = 1) |> 
  ggplot(aes(A, Fd))+
  geom_point()
```
